article_title: Hatch, Paulsen Aim To Supercharge Healthcare Savings Accounts, Restore OTC Meds Coverage

article_metadata.author: Ashlea Ebeling

og.description: Over-the-counter medications would count as eligible expenses under a bill that makes a couple dozens of updates to health savings accounts and healthcare flexible spending accounts.
og.title: Hatch, Paulsen Aim To Supercharge Healthcare Savings Accounts, Restore OTC Meds Coverage
